= Introduction =

Here is a non-exhaustive table of populars hashing algorithms displaying whether they are implemented or not.

If you think I should implement a new one just [http://code.google.com/p/krhash/issues/entry fill out a ticket].

||md2||no||
||md4||yes||
||md5||yes||
||sha0||no||
||sha1||yes||
||lm||yes||
